parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in the specified region.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description:
The name of the database. The following restrictions apply:

*   Contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_).
*   Must start with a letter.
*   Up to 63 characters in length.
